awd_titl_txt: The Third International Symposium on Robotics Research,     Fall, 1985, Gouvieux, France
awd_abstract_narration: Travel assistance is provided to the U.S. participants in the Third             International Symposium on Robotics Research being held in the fall of          1985 in Gouvieux near Paris, France.  The symposium brings together, by         invitation only, the leading robotics researchers in the world.  The            proceedings of these international meetings provide the most up-to-date         reference to the current state of robotics research.  These conferences         play a vital role in bringing robotic researchers together, delivering          important papers in this area, and making available in one place yearly         reviews of research in this fast moving field.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Microelectronic Information Processing Systems
